channel.title: acl-2019 on NTU-NLP
channel.description: Recent content in acl-2019 on NTU-NLP

item.title: Discourse Processing and Its Applications --- Tutoral at ACL-2019
item.description: Discourse processing is a suite of Natural Language Processing (NLP) tasks to uncover linguistic structures from texts at several levels, which can support many NLP applications.
